author: Lupin 7
subject: PM3 & $1 Money Wars
body:
Avete all,

I just got my copy of Punch the Monkey! 3 and the $1 Money Wars yesterday; 
thought you all might be interested in hearing about it.  Firstly, PM3 is 
excellent, especially the Super Hero remix by the Orangers and the Theme 
from Lupin the Third 3(tracks 2 and 4 respectively); I haven't finished 
watching $1 yet but its pretty good, especially the chase at the beginning. 
I'll provide some Mp3s and some screens in a few days if I'm not too lazy 
about it(no guarantees); I work and sleep so, you know how stressfull 
sleep...I mean work, can be.

Punch the Monkey 3!:
1. Lupin the IIIrd 97'
2. Super Hero
3. Theme from Lupin the IIIrd 3
4. Theme from Lupin the IIIrd 3(different artist than above)
5. Toward the Patrol Line
6. Love Theme
7. Samba Temperado
8. Love Theme(different than above)
9. Vocal Version, theme from Lupin the IIIrd Vocal Version
10. Lupin the Third 1980

"L U P I N"

David
